overview:
Scott Julian is a seasoned Internet industry professional with years of board level business experience.

His unparalleled understanding of the digital media landscape has enabled him to grow and sell several businesses including social networking company TheScene & online business services company Gate13.

Scott currently holds board seats with 5 companies ranging from medical software to mobile content, and is currently the CEO of Global measurement firm Effective Measure

Prior to his directors roles, Scott held media communications rolls with, ISIS communications LTD, the Commonwealth Secretariat, the International Air Transport Association and in the Defence Industry.

Scott also travels the world to advise business groups on eCommerce & digital marketing issues, speaking at forums and networking events.

Scott is a Fellow of the Australian Institute of Management, and a member of the Australian Institute of Company Directors.
